title: SDE ||
subtitle: Software Development Engineer ||
responsibilities: Develop cutting-edge software solutions using your expertise in AWS, C++ Programming, Flutter, Java, Node.js, and ReactJS
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement software applications
Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure high-quality and seamless performance
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and bring new ideas to the table for continuous improvement
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to enhance code quality
Work closely with clients to understand their requirements and deliver customized solutions that meet their needs

title: RE - | (PERCEPTION)
subtitle: Robotics Engineer |
responsibilities: Program the automation bots according to the assigned project
Create a workflow chart of a client process well before the discovery phase
Record the workflow and update comments, on how to point to the workflow
Handle the error and proper alert notifications with regard to automation in and out of the framework
Perform code optimization and identifies potential issues and defects
Communicate with the automation product support teams on software-related issues, suggests in case of any improvements, and seek advice from other users in the product community
Develop automation scripts and automation/orchestration technologies (using BluePrism/UiPath/automation anywhere)

title: SCE ||
subtitle: Supply Chain Engineer ||
responsibilities: Work on inventory management
Work on order processing and fulfillment
Work on logistics and shipping:
Work on supply chain management
Work on quality control
Work on return and exchange management
Work on operational efficiency
Work on data analysis and reporting
Work on team collaboration
Work on compliance and risk management

title: RC ||
subtitle: Recruitment Coordinator ||
responsibilities: Proven work experience as an IT Recruitment
Familiarity with Applicant Tracking Systems and resume databases
Experience with sourcing techniques
Understanding of referral programs
Solid verbal and written communication skills
Assist with all internal and external HR-related matters.
Participate in developing organizational guidelines and procedures.
Recommend strategies to motivate employees.
Assist with the recruitment process by identifying candidates, conducting reference checks, and issuing employment contracts.
